thread.section_title: Castleberg Outdoors Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Castleberg Outdoors | www.castlebergoutdoors.co.uk
thread.title: Outdoor nut!
thread.title_full: Castleberg Outdoors reviewed by Outdoor nut!

author: Outdoor nut!
title: Outdoor nut!
text: Excellent service and very easy to order. Delivery was also exceptionally quick. Delighted with the jacket and the Castleberg review really was helpful in deciding which jacket to purchase. Already warn on several walks, waterproof, windproof and exceptionally breathable.
